title: Our Packages
subtitle: Choose the right offer for your business – from first steps to full visibility.

banner.description: Start now and benefit from our introductory prices

painPoints.title: How visible is your restaurant online?
painPoints.subtitle: Free analysis of your Google presence – no obligation

notVisible.title: Not found on Google
notVisible.description: Your customers can't find you when searching for your service
notVisible.example: Example: "Restaurant Munich" - You're not in the first results

inconsistent.title: No consistent appearance
inconsistent.description: Different information on Google, Facebook and Instagram confuses customers
inconsistent.example: Example: Different opening hours on different platforms

outdated.title: Outdated information
outdated.description: Old menus, wrong prices or closed branches damage your image
outdated.example: Example: Summer menu still displayed in winter

noReviews.title: Few or bad reviews
noReviews.description: Missing reviews or unprocessed negative reviews affect your visibility
noReviews.example: Example: 2-star review without response from owner
